column3:
Would it make sense to expose the same boolean on RPC?

Btw, the latest optimize png script is now here: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/blob/master/optimize-pngs.py

Also, it would be good to add the svg source in case alternative versions need to be created.
> Would it make sense to expose the same boolean on RPC?\n\nWith which command name?
> Would it make sense to expose the same boolean on RPC?\n\nI think that's a good idea.

> > Would it make sense to expose the same boolean on RPC?

> With which command name?

`getnetworkinfo`?

> This PR is submitted not to the GUI repo because it touches files out of the src/qt directory.\n\nGiven this is just node.cpp/h and the changes are trivial, I think this should be in the GUI repo.
